DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate the associations of the age-related changes in the brain, kidneys and cognitive performance in healthy adults by utilizing multiple anatomic and functional MRI methods along with a battery of cognitive tests.
DOC.brief_title: Technical Development of Multi-Parametric Renocerebral MRI
